text:
e="preserve">Kossi Koudagba (2 October 1995 – 18 June 2020) was a Togolese professional footballer. He played as a striker for ASC Kara of the Togolese Championnat National and the Togo national team from 2018 until his death. He was born in Davié, Togo.
Koudagba died on 18 June 2020 at the age of 24.
